import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import AuthContext from '../../context/AuthContext'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; const Home = () => { const { isAuthenticated, isAdmin } = useContext(AuthContext); const { t } = useTranslation(); return (

{t('home.title')}

{t('home.subtitle')}

{!isAuthenticated && ( )}
{t('home.features.auth_title')} {t('home.features.auth_text')}
{t('home.features.voting_title')} {t('home.features.voting_text')}
{t('home.features.privacy_title')} {t('home.features.privacy_text')} {t('home.participate.title')} {t('home.participate.text')} {isAdmin ? t('home.admin_section.title') : t('home.results_section.title')} {isAdmin ? t('home.admin_section.text') : t('home.results_section.text')} How It Works
1
Connect Wallet

Authenticate with your blockchain wallet

2
Register

Verify your eligibility to vote

3
Cast Your Vote

Select your candidate and sign the transaction

4
Verify

Confirm your vote on the blockchain

 ); }; export default Home;
